verbose_text: In dopaminergic cell cultures, ginsenoside Rb1 has been shown to augment cellular antioxidant defenses by enhancing the PI3K/Akt/Nrf2 signaling pathway, thereby protecting cells from oxidative stress XREF_BIBR.
evidence:
ginsenoside Rb1 has been shown to augment
